actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend section 144 of title 23, United States Code, to authorize the construction of bridges to replace ferryboat service.

summary.text: Amends the law regarding highway bridge replacement and rehabilitation to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to approve Federal participation in the construction of bridges intended to replace ferryboat service whenever a State applies for Federal assistance. Provides that the Federal share payable for such highway bridge construction shall be 80 percent of the cost.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 144 of title 23, United States Code, to authorize the construction of bridges to replace ferryboat service.
